# easyTCP2

## what is easyTCP2?

it is like easyTCP (first version) but more stable, understandable, flexable, readable and more futures
(and also because i was too layz to update the last one)

## what I get from that package?
|             | easyTCP  | easyTCP2 |
|:-----------:|----------|----------|
| user levels |    yes   |    yes   |
| groups      |    no    |    yes   |
| events      |    no    |    yes   |
| stable      | not much |    yes   |
| logging     |    no    |    yes   |
| encryption  |    yes   |    soon  |
